decision_conditions: Prior to first occupation of the wheelchair accessible homes in the development the parking arrangements shown on the approved plans shall be made available.  The parking arrangements (for the site) shall include the provision of active (20 percent) and passive (for remaining 80%) vehicle charging points, and the 5 spaces shall be marked as blue badge parking bays. These parking spaces shall be kept continuously available and shall not be used for any other purpose. No additional car parking shall be formed or made available.

Reason: To ensure that there is adequate and inclusive parking provision within the site, to encourage the use of ultra-low carbon vehicles, and to ensure that excessive parking is not provided, in accordance with policy 6.13 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013); policies 1.1 (f) (g) of the Ealing Development Strategy 2026 (2012); (2016); policies T1, T3, T4, T6 of the London Plan (2021); and section 9 of the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) seeking to allow occupation of the affordable homes, save for the wheelchair accessible homes, in relation to planning permission reference 204095VAR dated 26/03/2021 for 'Application for a Minor Material Amendment (S73a) to vary conditions: 2 (approved drawings); 18 (cycle parking); 23b (design of LZC equipment); 24 (details of communal plant); 26 (post-construction energy monitoring) and 27 (sustainable design and construction) of planning permission ref: 194353FUL dated 20/03/2020 (as amended by 203082NMA, dated 21/08/2020 and 203277NMA, dated 22/09/2020) for: Construction of buildings up to nine-storey in height to provide residential. With vehicle access from Central Parade/ Western Avenue, amenity spaces, refuse and recycling storage and soft landscaping. Amendment seeks one additional 1 bed flat, erection of electricity substation, reduction in size of  the amenity space, amendments to fenestration on the north elevation, additional fenestration on the east elevation, amendment provides further details to satisfy conditions 18, 23b, 24 and 27 of planning permission 194353FUL.'
